newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo precious metals futures closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo precious metals futures closed for holiday.

text.p: Tokyo precious metals futures market is closed on Monday due to a national holiday. Trading will resume on Tuesday.
On Friday, gold futures ended higher across the board. Benchmark June 1998 was up 19 yen at 1,195 yen per gram.
The June platinum ended one yen higher at 1,357 yen per gram, and the June palladium was down one yen at 535 yen per gram. -- Tokyo Commodities Desk (+81-3-3432-7391)
